Name: Name
Definition: Column headers from each csv file in the dataset.

Name: Unit
Definition: Units that apply to a given column in the dataset.

Name: Definition
Definition: Description of the information in a given column in the dataset.

Name: File_Name
Definition: Name of the files in the dataset/data package.

Name: File_Description
Definition: A brief description of the files in the dataset/data package.

Name: Header_Orientation
Definition: Orientation of header field (horizontal or vertical)

Name: InstallationMethod_ID
Definition: Unique user-determined ID for a method described in the InstallationMethods_Description column in InstallationMethods.csv and listed as a metadata header row term in the data files.

Name: InstallationMethod_Description
Definition: Free text field to describe the sensor installation/deployment design; structure; or general information.

Name: HeaderRows_*
Definition: The number of header rows in a given data file(s). In each file; the number of header rows replaces the asterisk.

Name: HeaderRows_Format
Definition: Header row that explains the format of the other header rows. The format is Column_Header; Unit; InstallationMethod_ID; Instrument_Summary.

Name: DateTime
Definition: Date and time of measurement completed to the known precision. Recorded in Pacific Standard Time. UTC offset is reported in the data file(s) header row for the column.

Name: Column_Long_Name
Definition: Longer human readable version of the machine readable column header.

Name: Type
Definition: Type of term (column header; row header; data flag).

Name: Data_Type
Definition: Type of data (text; numeric; date).

Name: Standard
Definition: Standard applied to the data file.

Name: Contact
Definition: Contact for the file.

Name: Start_Date
Definition: The earliest date in the file.

Name: End_Date
Definition: The latest date in the file.

Name: Missing_Value_Codes
Definition: Missing value codes.

Name: Notes
Definition: Free text notes.

Name: UTC_Offset
Definition: UTC offset of date/time stamp.

Name: Site_ID
Definition: Site ID. Three-digit alphanumeric code used to identify site.

Name: Pressure
Definition: Barometric pressure; absolute.

Name: Pressure_Slope
Definition: Slope of the line for the linear regression of pressure sample data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Pressure versus time linear regression slope value

Name: Pressure_Rsquared
Definition: R-squared value for the linear regression of pressure data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Pressure versus time linear regression R-squared value

Name: Pressure_RMSE
Definition: The root mean square error (RMSE) for the linear regression of pressure data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Pressure versus time linear regression root mean square error (RMSE)

Name: Pressure_Mean
Definition: The sample mean pressure.

Name: Pressure_Range
Definition: The spread of pressure data values (maximum value minus the minimum value).

Name: Air_Temperature
Definition: Air temperature.

Name: Air_Temperature_Slope
Definition: Slope of the line for the linear regression of air temperature sample data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Air temperature versus time linear regression slope value

Name: Air_Temperature_Rsquared
Definition: R-squared value for the linear regression of air temperature data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Air temperature versus time linear regression R-squared value

Name: Air_Temperature_RMSE
Definition: The root mean square error (RMSE) for the linear regression of air temperature data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Air temperature versus time linear regression root mean square error (RMSE)

Name: Air_Temperature_Mean
Definition: The sample mean air temperature.

Name: Air_Temperature_Range
Definition: The spread of air temperature data values (maximum value minus the minimum value).

Name: Temperature
Definition: Water temperature.

Name: Temperature_Slope
Definition: Slope of the line for the linear regression of MantaRiver water temperature sample data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Water temperature versus time linear regression slope value

Name: Temperature_Rsquared
Definition: R-squared value for the linear regression of MantaRiver water temperature data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Water temperature versus time linear regression R-squared value

Name: Temperature_RMSE
Definition: The root mean square error (RMSE) for the linear regression of MantaRiver water temperature data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Water temperature versus time linear regression root mean square error (RMSE)

Name: Temperature_Mean
Definition: The sample mean MantaRiver water temperature.

Name: Temperature_Range
Definition: The spread of MantaRiver water temperature data values (maximum value minus the minimum value).

Name: Specific_Conductance
Definition: Specific conductance. Electrical conductivity at 25 degrees celsius.

Name: Specific_Conductance_Slope
Definition: Slope of the line for the linear regression of MantaRiver specific conductance sample data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Specific conductance versus time linear regression slope value

Name: Specific_Conductance_Rsquared
Definition: R-squared value for the linear regression of MantaRiver specific conductance data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Specific conductance versus time linear regression R-squared value

Name: Specific_Conductance_RMSE
Definition: The root mean square error (RMSE) for the linear regression of MantaRiver specific conductance data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Specific conductance versus time linear regression root mean square error (RMSE)

Name: Specific_Conductance_Mean
Definition: The sample mean MantaRiver specific conductance.

Name: Specific_Conductance_Range
Definition: The spread of MantaRiver specific conductance data values (maximum value minus the minimum value).

Name: Turbidity
Definition: Turbidity. Negative turbidity values are a result of the difference in FNUs between the zero FNU calibration point performed by the manufacturer and the near-zero FNU of many of the clear headwater streams and rivers in the study area. Negative turbidity values should be interpreted as FNU that is not distinguishable from zero.

Name: Turbidity_Slope
Definition: Slope of the line for the linear regression of MantaRiver turbidity sample data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Turbidity versus time linear regression slope value

Name: Turbidity_Rsquared
Definition: R-squared value for the linear regression of MantaRiver turbidity data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Turbidity versus time linear regression R-squared value

Name: Turbidity_RMSE
Definition: The root mean square error (RMSE) for the linear regression of MantaRiver turbidity data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Turbidity versus time linear regression root mean square error (RMSE)

Name: Turbidity_Mean
Definition: The MantaRiver sample mean turbidity.

Name: Turbidity_Range
Definition: The spread of MantaRiver turbidity values (maximum value minus the minimum value).

Name: pH
Definition: pH.

Name: pH_Slope
Definition: Slope of the line for the linear regression of MantaRiver pH sample data against time.
Column_Long_Name: pH versus time linear regression slope value

Name: pH_Rsquared
Definition: R-squared value for the linear regression of MantaRiver pH data against time.
Column_Long_Name: pH versus time linear regression R-squared value

Name: pH_RMSE
Definition: The root mean square error (RMSE) for the linear regression of MantaRiver pH data against time.
Column_Long_Name: pH versus time linear regression root mean square error (RMSE)

Name: pH_Mean
Definition: The MantaRiver sample mean pH.

Name: pH_Range
Definition: The spread of MantaRiver pH values (maximum value minus the minimum value).

Name: Battery
Definition: Remaining sensor internal battery voltage.

Name: Battery_Slope
Definition: Slope of the line for the linear regression of MantaRiver battery voltage sample data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Battery voltage versus time linear regression slope value

Name: Battery_Rsquared
Definition: R-squared value for the linear regression of MantaRiver battery voltage data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Battery voltage versus time linear regression R-squared value

Name: Battery_RMSE
Definition: The root mean square error (RMSE) for the linear regression of MantaRiver battery voltage data against time.
Column_Long_Name: Battery voltage versus time linear regression root mean square error (RMSE)

Name: Battery_Mean
Definition: The MantaRiver sample mean battery voltage.

Name: Battery_Range
Definition: The spread of MantaRiver battery voltage values (maximum value minus the minimum value).

Name: Minidot_SN
Definition: MiniDOT sensor serial number.

Name: Sample_Name
Definition: In the field metadata file: Water chemistry sample vial ID. Chemistry data is published in a separate data package. In the IGSN mapping file: site ID.
Column_Long_Name: Site water chemistry sample vial ID

Name: Date
Definition: Data collection date.
Column_Long_Name: Date of field site visit and data collection

Name: Time_Zone
Definition: Time zone in which the data was collected; recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: All time stamps recorded either manually in the field or in sensor log files converted to Pacific Standard Time regardless of Daylight Saving Time

Name: Field_Staff
Definition: The name of field staff involved in data collection. Listed by "Last Name; First Name" and separated by commas.
Column_Long_Name: First and last names of field staff

Name: Time_Arriving
Definition: Site arrival time. Recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: Field site visit time of arrival

Name: Time_Leaving
Definition: Site departure time. Recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: Field site visit time of departure

Name: Weather
Definition: Weather conditions (sunny; partly cloudy; overcast; raining; other) during data collection.
Column_Long_Name: Weather conditions at the time of data collection

Name: Vegetation
Definition: General type of vegegation present in the riparian corridor. Up to two of the following types may be selected if mixed: needleaf evergreen tree; needleaf deciduous tree; broadleaf evergreen tree; broadleaf deciduous tree; shrub; grass; crop; and/or not vegetated.

Name: Stream_Hydrogeomorphology
Definition: General hydrogeomorphology of river. One of the following classes may be selected: multi-channel (braided); single-channel straight; single-channel meandering.

Name: Stream_Gradient
Definition: General gradient of river. One of the following classes may be selected: relatively flat/gentle gradient (e.g.; valleys) or relatively steep gradient (e.g.; mountainous or hilly terrain).

Name: Dominant_Sediment_Type
Definition: Estimated dominant sediment type/size class of streambed. Size/type classes include gravel/cobble (>2mm); sand; silt/mud (<0.0625mm); or bedrock (primarily).
Column_Long_Name: Dominant sediment type/size class of streambed

Name: Canopy_Coverage
Definition: Estimated canopy cover over the river only. Total riparian zone canopy cover does not apply. One of the following classes may be selected: >70%; 30-70%; 5-30%; or none.

Name: Macrophyte_Coverage
Definition: Estimated canopy cover over the river only. Total riparian zone canopy cover does not apply. One of the following classes may be selected: >70%; 30-70%; 5-30%; or none.

Name: Algal_Mat_Coverage
Definition: Estimated algal mat cover on riverbed. One of the following classes may be selected: >70%; 30-70%; 5-30%; or none.

Name: Latitude
Definition: Geographic location (latitude) of site. GPS data collected using MyGPS app installed on handheld cellular phone (iPhone or Android) or Samsung Galaxy Tab A7.

Name: Longitude
Definition: Geographic location (longitude) of site. GPS data collected using MyGPS app installed on handheld cellular phone (iPhone or Android) or Samsung Galaxy Tab A7.

Name: GPS_Accuracy
Definition: Accuracy of GPS location data accuracy; measured in feet.

Name: MiniDot_Start_Time
Definition: Time when sensor logging is turned on for a MiniDot sensor deployment using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: MiniDot Logger data logging start time

Name: Equilibration_Start_Time
Definition: The start time of sensor equilibration period for a MiniDot Logger deployment using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: MiniDot Logger sensor equilibration start time

Name: Equilibration_End_Time
Definition: The end time of sensor equilibration period for a MiniDot Logger deployment; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: MiniDot Logger sensor equilibration end time

Name: Test_Start_Time
Definition: The start time of data collection during a test period for a MiniDot Logger deployment using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: MiniDot Logger test data collection start time

Name: Test_End_Time
Definition: The end time of data collection during a test period for a MiniDot Logger deployment using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: MiniDot Logger test data collection end time

Name: MiniDot_End_Time
Definition: The time when sensor logging is turned off for a MiniDot Logger deployment using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in military time Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: MiniDot Logger data logging end time

Name: MiniDot_SN
Definition: MiniDOT Logger sensor serial numbers. Field contains the serial numbers of three MiniDOT Logger  deployed to collect triplicate time series data during a test period for a MiniDot sensor deployment using a specified InstallationMethod_ID. Serial numbers separated by comma.

Name: Ultrameter_Specific_Conductance_1
Definition: First of three consecutive Ultrameter measurements of specific conductance. Electrical conductivity at 25 degrees celsius.
Column_Long_Name: First Ultrameter specific conductance measurement Electrical conductivity at 25 degrees celsius

Name: Ultrameter_Specific_Conductance_2
Definition: Second of three consecutive Ultrameter specific conductance measurements. Electrical conductivity at 25 degrees celsius.
Column_Long_Name: Second Ultrameter specific conductance measurement Electrical conductivity at 25 degrees celsius

Name: Ultrameter_Specific_Conductance_3
Definition: Third of three consecutive Ultrameter specific conductance measurements. Electrical conductivity at 25 degrees celsius.
Column_Long_Name: Third Ultrameter specific conductance measurement Electrical conductivity at 25 degrees celsius

Name: Ultrameter_Specific_Conductance_Mean
Definition: The mean value calculated for three consecutive Ultrameter specific conductance measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_Specific_Conductance_Range
Definition: The spread of the data (maximum value minus the minimum value) calculated for three consecutive Ultrameter specific conductance measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_Specific_Conductance_Outlier
Definition: The binary value of the statistical outlier (whether the parameter value lies outside the interquartile range) among three consecutive Ultrameter specific conductance measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_pH_1
Definition: First of three consecutive Ultrameter pH measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_pH_2
Definition: Second of three consecutive Ultrameter pH measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_pH_3
Definition: Third of three consecutive Ultrameter pH measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_pH_Mean
Definition: The mean value calculated for three consecutive Ultrameter pH measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_pH_Range
Definition: The spread of the data (maximum value minus the minimum value) calculated for three consecutive Ultrameter pH measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_pH_Outlier
Definition: The binary value of the statistical outlier (whether the parameter value lies outside the interquartile range) among three consecutive Ultrameter pH measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_Total_Dissolved_Solids_1
Definition: First of three consecutive Ultrameter total dissolved solids measurements.
Column_Long_Name: First Ultrameter total dissolved solids measurement

Name: Ultrameter_Total_Dissolved_Solids_2
Definition: Second of three consecutive Ultrameter total dissolved solids measurements.
Column_Long_Name: Second Ultrameter total dissolved solids measurement

Name: Ultrameter_Total_Dissolved_Solids_3
Definition: Third of three consecutive Ultrameter total dissolved solids measurements.
Column_Long_Name: Third Ultrameter total dissolved solids measurement

Name: Ultrameter_Total_Dissolved_Solids_Mean
Definition: The mean value calculated for three consecutive Ultrameter total dissolved solids measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_Total_Dissolved_Solids_Range
Definition: The spread of the data (maximum value minus the minimum value) calculated for three consecutive Ultrameter total dissolved solids measurements.
Column_Long_Name: Ultrameter total dissolved solids data spread

Name: Ultrameter_Total_Dissolved_Solids_Outlier
Definition: The binary value of the statistical outlier (whether the parameter value lies outside the interquartile range) among three consecutive Ultrameter total dissolved solids measurements.
Column_Long_Name: Ultrameter total dissolved solids data outlier

Name: Ultrameter_Temperature_1
Definition: First of three consecutive Ultrameter temperature measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_Temperature_2
Definition: Second of three consecutive Ultrameter temperature measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_Temperature_3
Definition: Third of three consecutive Ultrameter temperature measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_Temperature_Mean
Definition: The mean value calculated for three consecutive Ultrameter temperature measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_Temperature_Range
Definition: The spread of the data (maximum value minus the minimum value) calculated for three consecutive Ultrameter temperature measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_Temperature_Outlier
Definition: The binary value of the statistical outlier (whether the parameter value is lies outside the interquartile range) for three consecutive Ultrameter temperature measurements.

Name: Ultrameter_Time_1
Definition: Time of first set of Ultrameter measurements using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: Measurement time for first set of Ultrameter measurements

Name: Ultrameter_Time_2
Definition: Time of second set of Ultrameter measurements using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: Measurement time for first set of Ultrameter measurements

Name: Ultrameter_Time_3
Definition: Time of third set of Ultrameter measurements using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.
Column_Long_Name: Measurement time for first set of Ultrameter measurements

Name: BaroTroll_SN
Definition: In Situ Rugged BaroTROLL serial number.

Name: Manta_Time_Turned_On
Definition: Time when sensor logging is turned on for a Manta+ 35B sensor deployment using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.

Name: Manta_Start_Time
Definition: Start time of Manta+ 35B sensor deployment using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.

Name: Manta_End_Time
Definition: End time of Manta+ 35B sensor deployment using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.

Name: Manta_Time_Turned_Off
Definition: Time when sensor logging is turned off for a Manta+ 35B sensor deployment using a specified InstallationMethod_ID; completed to the known precision; and recorded in Pacific Standard Time.

Name: Manta_SN
Definition: Eureka Manta+ 35B multisonde serial number.

Name: Notes
Definition: Free text field to record notes related to the site visit; including weather; site disturbance; sensor installation difficulties; or other information relevant to the quality of data collected.

Name: Temperature_Minidot1
Definition: Statistical metrics generated for temperature data  collected with Minidot Logger 1 (i.e.; sample) using a specified InstallationMethod_ID. Five metrics were calculated for each sample at every site; including lm_slope; R_square; RMSE; Mean; and Range; which are also defined in the data dictionary. In each summary statistics file; each site is associated with five rows of summary statistics data (one row for each metric).
Column_Long_Name: Statistical metrics generated for temperature data collected with Minidot 1

Name: Temperature_Minidot2
Definition: Statistical metrics generated for temperature data collected with Minidot Logger 2 (i.e.; sample) using a specified InstallationMethod_ID. Five metrics were calculated for each sample at every site; including lm_slope; R_square; RMSE; Mean; and Range; which are also defined in the data dictionary. In each summary statistics file; each site is associated with five rows of summary statistics data (one row for each metric).
Column_Long_Name: Statistical metrics generated for temperature data collected with Minidot 2

Name: Temperature_Minidot3

In each summary statistics file; each site is associated with five rows of summary statistics data (one row for each metric).
Column_Long_Name: Statistical metrics generated for temperature data collected with Minidot 3

Name: IGSN
Definition: International Geo Sample Numbers (IGSNs) registered with System for Earth Sample Registration (SESAR; https://www.geosamples.org/about/services#igsnregistration)

Name: Other_Name
Definition: Alternate name used for site in addition to site ID listed in Sample_Name column.

Name: Primary_Physiographic_Feature
Definition: Type of physical feature that sample was collected from (suggested vocabulary from SESAR).

Name: Physiographic_Feature_Name
Definition: Name of the phsyiographic feautre (river).

Name: State_or_Province
Definition: State or province.

Name: Country
Definition: Country where sample was collected.

Name: Field_Program_Cruise
Definition: Name of field program or cruise registered in the SESAR system.
